name: Toilet Paper Delivery
description:
The end is near! But as a good civilian, you decide to roam the neighborhood and save lifes by delivering... toilet paper! In Toilet Paper Delivery, timing is everything, so use your skills to target the closest mailbox and shoot some toilet paper in it, your neighbor will thank you for it.

Features

  • A custom soundtrack
  • Speech bubbles with references and easter eggs
  • Toilet paper

Credits

  • Programming & Visuals - Pascal Wohlwender
  • Audio & Visuals - Nicolas Beeler
